tool_description: French SIREN reference, siren2url, url2siren, siren2phone, siren2logo, url2logo
name: SIREN
title: SIREN

api_list.name: siren2url
api_list.description: Get an URL link from a French SIREN reference. This API works with all French companies having a website (a 404 response is returned for companies having no website).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://siren.p.rapidapi.com/siren2url/491023073"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "siren.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://siren.p.rapidapi.com/siren2url/{siren}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "siren.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: url2siren
api_list.description: From a website URL of a French company, get the company's SIREN registration number.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://siren.p.rapidapi.com/url2siren/https/www.restoflash.fr"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "siren.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://siren.p.rapidapi.com/url2siren/{protocol}/{domain}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "siren.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
